title: Calories in White Claw
meta_description: Learn calories in White Claw per can, plus carbs, sugars, full nutrition facts, and tweaks for variations in this popular hard seltzer.
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) can of White Claw hard seltzer, 5% ABV; nutrition similar across flavors like Black Cherry or Mango.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies slightly by flavor, batch, and serving size. Alcohol provides additional energy not shown in standard facts. Check labels and drink responsibly.

quick_answer.text: One 12 fl oz can of White Claw contains 100 calories and 2 grams of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to White Claw Pure (lower carb version)

faqs.q: How many calories in one White Claw?
faqs.a: About 100 calories per 12 fl oz can.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in White Claw?
faqs.a: 2 grams of carbohydrates, all from sugars, per can.

faqs.q: Does White Claw have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; it's primarily carbs and alcohol.

faqs.q: How does White Claw compare calorie-wise to beer?
faqs.a: Lower than most beers (100 kcal vs. 150+ kcal for a 12 oz light beer).

faqs.q: Are calories the same for all White Claw flavors?
faqs.a: Yes, standard flavors are consistent at 100 kcal per can.
